archimate:ValueStream.name: Value Stream
archimate:ValueStream.documentation: A Value Stream represents a sequence of activities that create an overall result for a customer, stakeholder, or end user.

properties.value: An end-to-end collection of activites that create a result for a customer, who may be the ultimate customer or an internal end-user of the value stream.
A representation of an end-to-end collection of activities that create an overall result for a customer, stakeholder, or end-user.
